sentences.en: And the employment report didn't change the minds of some stalwart market optimists.
sentences.cn: 就业报告未改变部分坚定的市场乐观派的观点.

sentences.en: Finally one of the managers bustled up to the stalwart darky .
sentences.cn: 后来终于有一个经理跑到这个健壮的黑人面前。

sentences.en: He had a stalwart figure and walked with an air.
sentences.cn: 他身材魁梧,走起路来很有气派.

sentences.en: I knew I was never in any danger with my stalwart bodyguard around me.
sentences.cn: 我知道有强壮的保镖在我的周围，我永远不会有什么危险。

sentences.en: It described the group's head as a "stalwart of the opposition faction", according to the South China Morning Post, which saw the notice on a website run by Minzu University in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 根据南华早报的消息，通知描述了该组织的领导人是一个“反对派坚定的支持者”，南华早报是在北京民族大学运行的网站上看到这则通知的。

sentences.en: Let me introduce Bob, one of the club's stalwart.
sentences.cn: 让我来介绍鲍伯, 俱乐部的忠实拥护者.

sentences.en: Luna Moonfang is a stalwart and devout follower of the Moon Goddess, Elune.
sentences.cn: 露娜·月牙是月之女神艾露恩坚定且虔诚的信徒.

sentences.en: Moving to Germany, he became a stalwart of the revered Kurt Edelhagen Orchestra.
sentences.cn: 搬到德国后，他成了著名的库尔特·埃德尔哈根管弦乐队的一名忠实听众。

sentences.en: Please be stalwart in your journey. We need you and rely upon your Light, Love and service as we co-create the New Earth together.
sentences.cn: 坚定地行走你的旅程。我们需要你，依赖着你的光，爱和服务，随着我们共同创造新地球。
强壮的警察在外面警戒.

sentences.en: The original flick is a stalwart of the genre, and it is the duty of everyone, not just horror fans, to watch it at least once.
sentences.cn: 原版电影是一种坚定的流派，不仅仅是狂热的影迷，每个人都有义务去看至少一遍。

sentences.en: The prince is tall and stalwart.
The stalwart Mazzy Fentan has earned a legendary amount of fame serving the cause of good.
sentences.cn: 强悍的玛兹·芬顿从为正义而战中获得了传奇的名声.

sentences.en: The stalwart volunteers marched in this morning ready to go to work.
sentences.cn: 忠实的志愿者们今天上午已就位，随时准备开始工作。

sentences.en: To make a courageous show or to put up a stalwart front.
sentences.cn: 做勇敢状或建起一道坚固的前线.

sentences.en: To the extent the Shiites feel attacks, Iran will be seen as a stalwart coreligionist ally.
sentences.cn: 而什叶派人士认为抗争的时候到了, 伊朗被其看作坚定无比的盟友.

sentences.en: Two stalwart girls came down the library steps and out through one of the iron gates.
sentences.cn: 两个健壮的姑娘下了图书馆台阶,穿过其中一扇铁门.

trans.tran_cn: 强壮的，结实的，坚定的，可靠的
高大健壮的人，忠实拥护者
trans.tran_en: someone who is very loyal to a particular organization or set of ideas, and works hard for them
